title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cartman house, night. Sharon brings a box into the dining room.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eric, Mommy got you a present!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: A present?? Is it a rocket racer?? No, let me guess: It's a Froagman Jay doll! No wait, I know! It's a police power chopper!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Nnno, I got you something that's going to help you win the big spelling bee tomorrow.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mom, I'm not going to win the spelling bee; I never do.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: This year is gonna be different. Look! I got you "Hooked On Monkey Fonics."

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What the hell is "Hooked On Monkey Fonics?"

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: It's a new way to learn how to read and spell. And it comes with everything you need to help win that speling bee. It says we just put the cassette into a tape player

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Welcome to "Hooked On Monkey Fonics," level 1. I will read the sounds and the monkey will help keep the beat. If your monkey arrived in the box dead, call 1-800-555-4500 to get a new monkey. Ready? Let's begin.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: The learning monkey is here to say

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: That reading is easy and it's okay.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Liane starts swaying like a metronome

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: Work with the monkey and you will learn

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: To spell hard words, like "morbid" and "burn."

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: Start with Card 1. [Liane holds it up] Ready? Begin! [glissant]
text: C, H. [a "ch" sound] Chalk. [the monkey plays four beats more, then turns to Cartman. One more beat...]

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: C, H. "Ch." Chalk.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Good. Card 2.  T, H.  There.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: T, H. "Th." There. Hey, this is easy! I'm gonna win the spelling bee for sure, Mom!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: The 15th Annual South Park Spelling Bee Finals

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: On stage, back row, are Wendy, Kevin, Jordan, Clyde, Butters and Bebe. In the front row are Token, a new boy, an empty chair, Kyle, Stan, and Cartman. Off to the left, Mr. Mackey will keep score, but doesn't look at all happy about it. The Mayor is front and center

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: All right, everyone. Welcome to the 15th Annual South Park Spelling Bee Finals!  This should be very interesting. We have with us twelve of the brightest spellers from South Park Elementary.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Kyle, Kyle, he's our man. If he can't win it, I'm out 50 bucks.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You bet money on my son to win?!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Sure! When it comes to spelling bees, always bet on the Jew.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You're going down, bitch!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Shut up, fatass! Everyone knows I can spell better than you.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah, well this year I have a secret weapon!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: And, joining us this year, are the two home-schooled children, Rebecca and Mark Cotswolds!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What?!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Home-schooled kids? Who the hell are they?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ey, that's not fair! You can't let home-schooled kids into a public-school spelling bee!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What's a "home-schooled kid"?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I don't know, dude. I've never seen them before.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Go, Mark! Go, Rebecca!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Our first contestant is Mark Cotswolds, from home school.  All right, Mark. Your word is "conscientious."

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What?! What the fuck that that mean?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Conscientious." May I have the definition, please?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Closely attentive to details. Careful.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Conscientious." Could you use it in a sentence, please?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mary's analysis of the spreadsheet was... conscientious.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Conscientious." C O N S C I E N T I O U S.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Holy crap!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Way to go, Mark! Alright!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Okay, our next contestant is Eric Cartman. Alright, Eric, here's your word: chair. Chaaiirr.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Come on, Fonics Monkey, drum!  Come on!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eric, your word is "chair."

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uuh. Definition?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Something you sit on.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Country of origin?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: English!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Could you please use it in a sentence?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, for Christ's sake, kid! The word is "chair"!!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh- chair. C H A R E  God damnit, how come I get the hard ones?!  Get over here, you son of a bitch Fonics Monkey!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The spelling bee. After several rounds, the other kids are eliminated. The Cotswolds kids and Kyle are the only ones left.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: All right, we're down to just three finalists. First up is Rebecca Cotswolds from home school.  Alright, Rebecca. Here's your word: littoral.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Littoral." Deh-finition?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Having to do with a lake or ocean.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Littoral." Will you please use it in a sentence?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Gary was most interested in the littoral features of Michigan.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Littoral."  L I T O R A L

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Wow!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright, Rebecca. Good job, honey.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Now we have Kyle Broflovski.  Here we go. Krocsyldiphithic.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What??

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Krocsyldiphithic.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Definition?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Something which has a krocsyldiph-like quality.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh, could you use it in a sentence?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Certainly. "Krocsyldiphithic" is a hard word to spell.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Krocsyldiphic."

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You can do it, kid! You can do it!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: "Krocsyldiphic." C  Damnit!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You little bastard, you cost me fifty bucks.  Why don't you run away and join the circus, you stupid little son of a bitch?! Aaargh!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Congratulations, Mark and Rebecca. You are truly South Park's finest.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Damn, dude. Those home-schooled kids are smart.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah. Too bad they have the personalities of a wet dishcloth.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What's your name?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Guh what's in a name?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Wooww.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: It was nice competing against you boys. We will have to do it again sometime.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, yes. We must do it again.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: We've never seen you before. Do you live in the woods or something?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: No. I live right over there.  I've lived there all my life.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: How come you don't go to school?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Because I'm home-schooled.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What's that?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: My parent teach me. So I stay at home instead of going to school.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: Cartman;	You what? Stay at home? All day? No school?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Right.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: Who would have thought such a miracle could be?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: Who could have known that this moment I would see?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: A new way of living, a chance to be free?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Shut up, Cartman?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You shut up,  butthole.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You shut up,  gaywad!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You shut up,  ass-logger!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh my goodness, are you two enemies?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Nno, we're friends.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Strange, friends would call each other names and fight.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Come, children, let's take our trophies home and place them high up on the mantel.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Dude, what a bunch of freakin' nerdos.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cotswolds house, night. The family is at dinner

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Papa?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yes, Mark?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Why can't I go to school with the other boys?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oooh.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, because, son, public schools are inefficient and dangerous!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: But I want to play with the other children. O, how they laugh and play, Papá.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mark, you have play time. You get to play in the afternoon.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I just feel like I should go to public school, if only for a little while. To see what other little boys are like.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mark, public schools are no good! Your mother and I were both home-schooled, and we turned out much better because of it.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Please, Papá. Just let me try it for a few days.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright. Fine, Mark! You go ahead and go to public school! You can just find out for yourself how flawed and treacherous it is!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hooray!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You don't want to go to public school too, do you, Rebecca?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, heavens, no.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, thank God for that! At least my daughter will remain safe!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh, hi. Is, uh, is Rebecca home?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yes she is.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: ...Uuh, can I talk to her?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh. Well, I suppose so. Rebecca!  This little boy wants to see you.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Huhlo?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: U-u-uh, hi.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hel-lo.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Huuh, I wah... just ah... well... that's all.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Who was that?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: A little boy wanted to see Rebecca.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh no. I told you the spelling bee was a bad idea.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: But the children won, and they were happy to meet the other children.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yes, but now I think we may have opened a Pandora's box that we can't close!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: South Park Elementary, day. Mr. Garrison's class. Craig, Butters, and Tweek sit in the front row.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hokay, children, we have a new student joining us from home school. Now, his parents are very worried about his safety, so please don't be too cruel to him. Mark?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey, guys. What's up?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Dude, what's wrong with you? You got some kind of John Travolta disease?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright, children, let's just try to pretend there isn't a little boy in a huge plastic hamster ball here, and go on with our studies. Now, who can tell me when Columbus sailed the seas and discovered America?  Ehyes, Mark?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ey! How come you never pick me?!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Because you never know the right answer, butt-for-brains! Yes, Mark?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The answer is 1492. However, the Americas had already been discovered by many before him, including the Vikings and the Native Americans. And therefore, your question is a charade.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Aww, see? That's what I was gonna say!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, very impressive, Mark. You should be able to throw the grading curve and flunk all these little bastards.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, God. This kid's gonna last about five seconds out on the playground.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Now, who can tell me what country Columbus was from?  Put your hand down, creampuff.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: That does it!  I do not need to sit here and be ridiculed! I'm gonna go be home-schooled from now on!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You don't wanna be home-schooled, fatass.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I'm gonna be home-schooled, and leave all the pain and suffering of public school behind me! Screw you guys, I'm a-gonna be home-schooled!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, please God, let it be forever.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The playground. The recess bell rings and the kids rush out the door. Mark joins them in his huge hamster ball. Beside the jungle gym Stan and Pip stand next to each other, with Bebe and Jordan behind them

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Come on, Pip, say it. Say "Please, hit me."

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: But, if I say that, you'll hit me.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: No! I'm gonna hit you if you don't say it. If you say "Please, hit me," I won't hit you.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Please, hit me.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: All right.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ooowww!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright, we'll try this again, Pip.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I don't understand. You seem to like that boy, yet hate him at the same time.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey, kid. Get out of that hamster ball.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh. I promised my father I wouldn't.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, boy. Sorry, dude, you're on your own.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oowhy yu- you best do what he says, uh home-school kid. Why, this is our part of the playground, see? And uh, a-and if you don't follow our rules, whyuh, why we're gonna duct-tape ya to the bench.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You mean you would actually duct-tape my entire body to a bench? For what purpose?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Just get out of the hamster ball, or else you're gonna find out!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mark moves to the door and opens it. The ball moves, and Butters holds in in place while Mark flips his way out of it. Once he's on the ground, a bunch of boys come in and crowd him. Token, Bill, Tweek, Clyde, and Terrence join Craig and Butters in carrying Mark to the bench.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Okay, let's get him...

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Got it.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Have a nice second half of the day, nerdo!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah why, why, you shouldn't be such a smart-mouthed Mr. Know-It-All!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, dear.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cotswolds house. Mr. and Mrs. Cotswolds pace their living room, worried about their son's whereabouts

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, where could he be? He should've been home from public school by now.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I'm sure he's alright.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: That must be him.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Waaaaah!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh my God, son!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hi, Mom. Hi, Dad.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mark, what have they done to you?!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, they duct-taped me to a bench.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: But why?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I don't know, mother. It didn't make any sense at all.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, you see? This is what happens at public schools!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: But I want to go back tomorrow, papá.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What??

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Please, just give me one more day.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What do we do?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, if we're goin' to let him go back, it looks like I need to have a little talk with those other boys' fathers.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cotswolds house, night. A girl's bedroom is shown. Rebecca is at her desk writing.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: Everywhre I go, I'm thinking of you, Rebecca.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: she stops writing and looks to the window

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: I don't know what to do, Rebecca.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: she hops off the chair, walks over to her toy box and hops onto it

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: You're so nice, I'd like to get to know you better.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: she looks out the window. It is Kyle she sees

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: So what do you say we get together?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: You really are quite good-looking, Rebecca!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: You really are quite good-looking, Rebecca!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: she looks a bit more, then moves away from the window. Kyle waits, then brightens as she returns. She drops some money down to him, and it lands in the guitar case. She moves away again, and he looks at the money

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The town bar. Jimbo, Ned, Randy, and Gerald sit at the bar sipping some beers. As Mr. Cotswolds enters, the camera pulls back to reveal Stuart McCormick, Richard Tweek, and Craig's father at the bar with the others

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Good evening, gentlemen. If I can have your attention for a few moments.  My son Mark was beat up in school today by your sons. I think it would be appropriate for you to talk with your sons, and instruct them to no longer tease or bother my boy.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh, look, Mr....

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Cotswolds.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mr. Cotswolds, we can't completely control what our kids do socially. That's..., you know, that's for them to figure out on their own.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, obviously, they need to be coached a little better.  And furthermore, your son has been harassing my little girl! I would like you to tell him to stop.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey, my son is just discovering love. Maybe your daughter is, too. They-uh, they need to know about that stuff.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh, hello-o? My girl is eight years old! What does she need to know about love?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, something. I mean, you can't just wait until she's a teenager and expect her to figure out everything all at once.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I will not tell you how to raise your children, and you will not tell me how to raise mine!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eh, you wanna beer or something, Cotswolds?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: No, I don't drink beer. I just like wine coolers.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You what??

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The town bar, later. The men head out the door.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: See ya, Cotswolds.  Thanks for stopping by.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah. See ya.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: South Park Elementary, the cafeteria, next day. Lunchtime. Stan, Kyle, and Kenny are at table

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: ...I can't even get her to understand. It's like she's from another planet.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Can I sit here with you?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Aw, man, if you have to.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Attention, students. Don't forget that this Friday night is the South Park Elementary Bay Of Pigs Memorial Dance. We will have a very special band performing, so please come early.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey! That's it! That dance! I can ask Rebecca to go to the dance!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Dude, what happened to you? You're a total wuss now.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: (Heheh, yeah. You're a faggot, dude. Fuck, yeah. Hehe-eheh.)

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Why do you call Kyle names and laugh at him? Is he not your friend?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah, dude, but guys just do that. We rip on each other and stuff.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I see. It's like, you have to mark your territory as a boy. You have to socially find your place.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What??

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Enjoying your lunch, nerdo?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ah! Stick and stones may break my bones, but words will never harm me.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ah, dude, you don't say that.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Huh?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Get him!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Boy, that kid's having a hard time adjusting to public school.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah. I wonder how Cartman is doing with his home-schooling.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cartman house, afternoon. Cartman is in bed with a bag of chips.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eeehhh.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Welcome to Huntin' and Killin' with Jimbo and Ned.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eehh, shut up.  Ooohhh, yeasss.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hon, are you ready for some math problems?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eh, not right this second, mother. Put them there by the door.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, all right.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mom?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yes?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Could you turn up the heat just a little?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Sure, hon.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Egghhh. Dude, home-schooling rules. Yeeehhhhhhss!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cotswolds house, afternoon. Kyle approaches the front door and rings the bell. Rebecca answers and immediately puts her hands together

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, hel-lo.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hoh! Uh, Rebecca. There's this dance, see, at the school, and um,

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: He-ey, would you like to come up to my room?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Huh?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Woowould you like to come up to my room?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uuuh, okay.  Gah!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cotswolds house, the living room. Mark is talking with his parents

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I'm sorry, son. There's nothing we can do to stop those bullies. We have to pull you out of public school.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, papá. Can I at least go to the dance tomorrow?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well alright, you can go, but I'll be there to supervise.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright.

text: Mark, where's your sister?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: She's upstairs playing Doctor with that Kyle boy.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, alright.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What?!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Rebecca! Aaah! Aaaaah! Noo-hooo!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Rebecca, don't play that perverted game!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I have to extricate a rr-region in his cerebral cortex, or risk ih-nfection to the synaptic responses.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ah. Alright. Rebecca. But it's time to start your home-schooling!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Rebecca, there's this dance, see, the South Park Elementary Bay Of Pigs Memorial Dance, and uh, now I was wondering, ih-ih-ih if you wanna go.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hhm. Alright, I guess I'll go.

text: You will?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I guess. Are you gonna go? Maybe I'll see you there.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: No no. I mean, go with me.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, I'm sure Father will give me a ride.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cartman house, his bedroom. He still looks sleepy.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ahhhhhhhhh.  Ahhhhhhhhh-ahhhh. Tired, tired.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eric, I got you a new history textbook. Why don't you come downstairs.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Wwaargh. Not right now, Mom.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eric, please. We have to do some studying today.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I am studying, Mom. I'm learning with the Fonics Monkey.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey, fatass, how's home-schooling going?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, it's soo sweet, you guys.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, get your ass out of bed!  We have to go deal with that home-school kid!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Huh, I can't. I'm too tired.  Maybe tomorrow.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: (Hey, can I have that?)  (Heey.)

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: But the big dance is tomorrow and all the guys are gonna duct-tape him to a flagpole.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: That sounds cool. Maybe I'll go to that.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: (Hey!)  (Hey, Cartman, help me.)

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Stop it, Fonics Monkey!  I'm warning you! Stop that, Fonics Monkey!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh my God, Fonics Monkey killed Kenny!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You're damn straight, he did.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The Cotswolds house, later that afternoon. Kyle is in the backyard waiting for Rebecca. She comes out and closes the sliding door.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You got my note?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh of course. You taped it to my dog; how could I not see it?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh, can we sit down?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Wha-y noh-ot?  Isn't Papa's garden beautiful? He works so hard on it.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Rebecca, don't you ever... look at the town? At that...  flicker of light over there?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I...  have looked at it.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, that's a public school. And in it there are children,  just like us.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: How can children go to school on a f-licker of light?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: From public school, your house is just a flicker of light.  Don't you want to go out? All you do is... stay in your house and... study

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, what else would one do?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Love, for one thing.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: And woowhat is love?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Love ...is the most important thing on... earth. When boys and girls feel ...love, they kiss.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Woowhat means "ki-iss"?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: When a man and a woman feel ...love... they put their lips together.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, you mean a-a mate. When it is time to increase the herd, my provider will select one for me.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Rebecca, in public school,  we select our... own mate.  In public school, men and women get together. Make each other happy.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You certainly come from a silly place. Still, I should like to try that... kiss. So I cold write about it.  How do we do it?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I'm not completely sure.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Should we...  l-look it up?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: No, I think it's something you have to try a few times. Until you get it... right.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Wow. Wow, that was fun!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Dah.  Does that mean you'll go to the dance?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Y-you bet your sweet a-ass I will.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright, here's the plan. Tomorrow night at the dance, when none of the chaperones are looking, you guys go grab Mark. Bring him out here, and then we're gonna duct-tape him to this flagpole.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Are you sure? He can be out here all night on the flagpole.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: That's the point, buttpipe.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Don't call me a buttpipe, buttpipe!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Wewell, come on. We gotta buy us some more duct tape.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hooray!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hooray.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright, here's the plan. All we gotta do is volunteer to chaperone the dance tomorrow.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uhwhy do we want to all chaperone the dance?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Because Cotswolds is gonna to live there. And when he shows up, we all grab him, bring him out here, and duct-tape him to the flagpole!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: The flagpole! That's great!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Come on! We gotta buy more duct tape.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: South Park Elementary, night. It's Friday and the kids are gathering in the gym for the dance. Mark is already in the crowd, but the time is not yet. There isn't much to dance to, but kids dance anyway. Wendy and Bebe hop back and forth. Tweek dances as well. Pip is dancing in the background. Jordan and Clyde, Token and the redhead, Kevin, Terrence and Fosse, and the tattered kid stand around.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Dude, we're gonna go duct-tape that Mark kid to the bleachers. You wanna help?

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I can't. I have to wait for Rebecca to show up.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Oh, brother!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Don't you "Oh, brother" me! She's the woman of my dreams!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You suck now, Kyle!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You suck!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Boys and girls, can I have your attention, please? This year we have a very special guest performing the South Park Elementary Bay Of Pigs Memorial Dance. He was a musical force in the '70's and '80's. Please welcome Ronnie James Dio!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Are you ready to rock, boys and girls?! I said, are you ready to rock?!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh, uuh, sure uh, I guess.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Then let's hit it!  I know you all remember this one. It's off my first solo album. The song that you all helped me make number 1.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
role: Holy Diver, you've been down too long in the midnight sea.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey, there he is! There's the home-schooled kid!  Come on! Let's go duct-tape him to the flagpole!

text: Hey, isn't that the home-schooled kid's sister?

text: Hi, guys.

text: Woo-oh Holy Cow!

text: He-ey, baby. Come s-see me later, 'kay?

text: What the-? Damn, baby.

text: Hey, Kyle. Wanna go make out?

text: Rebecca. You...

text: Rebecca, what the devil are you doing?

text: I'm... having... fun, Mark.

text: Oh, my goodness!

text: You're out of control.  You did this to my sister!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Uh. All I did was show her how to-

text: You made my sister into a slut! I'll kill you!

text: Aaaah!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: You dip! I'm gonna whip your bitch ass!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Ooww!

text: Oh my God!

text: Dude, he's kicking the crap out of Kyle!

text: Yeah. He's a badass!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright, alright, that's enough, boys.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: ...I'm not through with you, bitch!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey, you're pretty cool, Mark.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah, tha-that was real badass how you stood up for your sister. Uh-uh-I'd have kicked Kyle's bitch ass, too.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Do you wanna go have some cake with me, Mark?

text: No! He's my friend!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Eh, he said he'd hang out with me!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: They've got to be here somewhere.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hey, there's Cotswolds. Come on! Let's duct-tape him to the flagpole!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Yeah!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Where are my children?! I'm taking them out of this God-forsaken place!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Calm down, papá!  Everything is all right.  You see, I've learned something today. Public schools may be a bit lacking in education, but it's the main place where children learn all of their social skills. You can't teach a child social skills. They have to learn them themselves. And the only place to do that is on the playground, in the cafeteria, and so on.  Don't you see, papá? That's what happened to your daughter. You tried so hard to keep her from anythng sexual, and now look at her. She's a God-damned whore, papá.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, she sure is.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: I know letting your kids out into the world is scary. I know you wish nothing bad would ever happen to us. But bad things will happen, and we have to start learning now how to deal with those things.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Mark. You're absolutely right.  Okay, childdren. If it's what you want, you can start going to public school.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Alright!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Nice speech, nerdo.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Thanks, gaywad.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Now you're gettin' it.

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Well, come on, guys. If I'm not mistaken, we still have someone to duct-tape to the flagpole!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: Hooray!

title: HOOKED ON MONKEY FONICS
text: What?!

text: See ya, papá!

text: Well, I'm glad we all learned something today, kids. Now, let's dance!
